Description:
Perfect accommodation for large family or great investment opportunity!
With a homely feel, this residence will create a perfect abode for a large family who are looking to be positioned in the heart of Clayton and close to amenities such as Monash University, Medical Centre, train stations, and potentially the M1 freeway.
This 2 storey weatherboard home has an abundance of living space, is spacious and includes 6 bedrooms with built in robes, two bathrooms, two toilets, laundry, kitchen/meals area with gas cooking.
Features included in the home are: polished floorboards throughout the downstairs, ducted heating, air conditioning, balcony with a view, swimming pool, garage and three extra driveway car spaces.
The opportunity also exists to re-develop opportunity the 710sqm of land for 2 townhouses or keep the existing front and build a new large townhouse at the back (S.T.C.A).

Description:
The best of the best
A wealth of space and style can be found in this dynamic 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom luxury town residence. Quality throughout with its polished boards, Caesar stone bench tops & secure entrance, this timeless contemporary haven features open plan living, huge alfresco covered/heated deck area, 3 big bedrooms with BIRs, main with ensuite and walk in robe, casual retreat upstairs, separate laundry, European stainless steel kitchen appliances, ducted heating & air-conditioning throughout. Walking distance to Clayton & Westall train station, Monash hospital, Clayton shopping village and a short trip to Monash University.
Moses Sawiris : 0421 485 627

Description:
Red Hot Redevelopment Opportunity
While the original home still stands, it's all about the land with this property. Measuring around 697 square metres approx., its superb corner positioning allows for a redevelopment opportunity not to be missed and would easily suit 2 or 3 stylish townhouses with their own street frontage (STCA). Alternatively families looking for the perfect site to build their dream home will find this established street an ideal neighbourhood to raise a family, close to Clayton Road's bustling shopping strip, buses, train station, schools, parklands & Monash Medical Centre.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Description:
Exceptional Modern Elegance!
This modern townhouse sits in a very sought after location in Clayton South close to Westall Train Station, schools and local shops, a short drive to Monash University, Monash medical centre, plus the Ikea and Harvey Norman shopping complex.
Comprises 5 bedrooms, main bedroom with ensuite, 3 toilets and a fully equipped open-plan kitchen with gas appliances. Features include central ducted heating, double lock-up garage,, fantastic large living areas and secluded private courtyards for you to entertain or relax in. Your dream house is right here! Call now to inspect!

Description:
Ideal First Home or Downsizer!
Immaculately presented, this 3 bedroom single storey brick town residence is the pinnacle of low- maintenance living. A sun-drenched living/dining area and stylish kitchen with Bosch appliances, solid hardwood polished floors throughout the living areas, and large master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe simply add to the appeal. This delightful home embraces a single lock-up garage, central ducted heating, evaporative cooling, air conditioning, alarm system and security doors, and a generous north facing rear outdoor entertainment area and low maintenance garden.
Located within close proximity to Clayton shops, train station and all transport hubs, recreational parklands and schools, this home provides an excellent lifestyle choice for the young and young at heart. It has great rentability and exciting growth potential for all.

Charming, Renovated & Ideal Location!
Step into this updated 2/3 bedroom home and be instantly surprised by its spacious and welcoming feel! The vendors have meticulously updated this home for you leaving nothing more to do. Recently polished floorboards throughout, freshly painted, an updated kitchen and bathroom and on a generous 650sqm approx block leaving the option for future re-development (STCA), Gas heating in lounge room, walking distance to Westall train station, solar hot water system and plenty of yard space. This light drenched home presents a great entry level opportunity!

Seize the opportunity
Under Instructions from the State Trustees Ltd
Presenting an outstanding opportunity to either redevelop or build your new home (Subject to council approval) this original post war weatherboard residence set on a wonderful parcel of approximately 780sqm is sure to arouse your interest. The property is ideally positioned with Keeley Reserve at the end of the street and within a few minutes' drive to Clayton strip shopping centre, train station and Monash Medical Centre. The home currently consists of 4 principle rooms that could also be refurbished to provide a rental return. Land: 15.24m x 51.2m approx.

Description:
Spacious Family Living with Old School Quality
UNDER EXECUTORS INSTRUCTIONS TO SELL this wonderful, solid and immaculately presented 3 bedroom plus study family home. Step inside and be impressed with the abundance of space including formal entry, generous lounge, family dining area and large and updated kitchen. There is also another living area which could be used as a games room, theatre room or kids retreat.
Other features include: Built in Robes, substantially sized block, Northerly Rear aspect, High ceilings, ceramic tiles, Split system air-conditioning, Gas cooking, Ducted heating, Large Laundry, 2 bathrooms, covered outdoor area, External Blinds and Double Lock up Garage.
In close proximity to Clayton Shopping Centre, Train Station and transport hub, you can't afford to miss this opportunity.
Call for an inspection today.

Description:
PERFECT FIRST HOME OR SMART INVESTMENT
First home buyers or smart investors looking to build their portfolio couldn't ask for a better purchase than this. Owner occupied and in absolutely pristine condition this villa unit set securely at the rear of a low maintenance development comprises of: large entry hall, open plan dining and living area with study nook, modern kitchen with gas cooking, 2 spacious bedrooms with built-in and walk-in robes, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry, and plenty of storage cupboards. All this complemented by extra large remote control garage with internal access, central heating and air conditioning, electric roller shutters to all windows, very generous backyard with extensive paving and covered entertaining area. Convenient location close to public transport, local schools, shops and parks making this property attractive to a variety of buyers. Act now!

Description:
SOLD BY KENNY PHAM for $725,500!!
Set on a huge 885sqm block, this property is a developers dream! With so much potential it would suit a wide number of prospective purchasers. The solid brick veneer home is comfortable and it comprises of front lounge room with duct heating kitchen with meals area, four generous bedrooms, original bathroom and separate toilet,
Outside feat double garage. There is the possibility of retaining the existing home and building a substantial town houses or units at rear OR removing the home and building multi town houses (S.T.C.A). It would also suit anyone wanting a considerable backyard with room to move. A solid home, side access and a fabulous location, you really can't ask for more from a property. Situated close to shops, schools, and walking distance to Westall station, it is one of the prime areas of Clayton South. Invest in your future, inspect today!

Description:
A Contemporary Masterpiece!
Cool, clean lines, high ceilings and quality finishes blend spectacularly with sleek, contemporary aesthetics, to create this stylish and sophisticated townhouse, an icon for low-maintenance and luxurious living. A sparkling designer kitchen showcases waterfall stone bench tops, stainless-steel dual drawer dishwasher and quality appliances, island bench with breakfast bar incorporated, ensuring easy service to the formal living and dining areas. Accommodation is plentiful on the 1st floor comprising 3 robed bedrooms, large master with WIR and ensuite, and a chic bathroom with bathtub. Alarm, ducted heating, powder room, under-stairs storage, laundry, courtyard and a remote garage complete this modern abode.

Description:
EXTENSIVELY RENOVATED UNIT
A great starter home or portfolio building investment, this unit on a block of just three represents great value, with recent upgrades only adding to its appeal. It begins with a handy location close to buses and local shops, as well as Westall Secondary College and the train station. Behind an unassuming facade, you'll find a light and fresh residence with polished hardwood floors and pristine paint - that enhance the lounge room with gas heater, as well as the renovated kitchen with included meals area and gas oven/stove. There are 2 bedrooms that both feature built-in wardrobes, plus an updated family bathroom and full laundry that provides access to the easily maintained courtyard.

Description:
RENOVATED & READY TO LIVE IN OR RENT OUT
Tastefully renovated and freshly painted in neutral tones, this three bedroom home is simply ideal for first home buyers or investors (with an estimated rental return of $400 per week). It offers a light-filled lounge/dining room with stunning floorboards underfoot and an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. The central bathroom has been completely transformed, and there is the added comforts of ducted heating and an air conditioner. Outside, the backyard is a great place to host family barbeques and there is a shed and single lock-up garage with carport space. In a convenient location, there are parklands at the end of the street, Clayton South Primary School is within walking distance and Clayton train station, shops, caf's and Monash University are all within close proximity.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.
Insights: 30 Merlyn Avenue, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
OVERSEAS VENDOR REQUIRES QUICK SALE!
With easy access to Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping Centre and public transportation at your door step, this rear home - unit in a block of 4, provides for both the home buyer and astute investor.
Features include:
* 2 good size bedrooms with Built in robes
* Separate Study or 3rd bedroom
* Spacious living room with stainless steel kitchen appliances
* Polished floor boards
* Split system heating & cooling
* Internal Laundry
* Entertainers rear courtyard
* Carport accommodation
Currently tenanted to excellent tenants and returning approximately over $17,000 per annum.
Inspect as advertised or by appointment.

Description:
A LIGHT, FRESH & AIRY 2 BEDROOM UNIT
After a recent freshen up, this 2 bedroom unit only requires its new owner to either move in and enjoy or rent it out in its perfect condition. On a well maintained block of just 9 units the home is light and airy with polished hardwood floors, classic off white paint and big picture windows that bring plenty of light into the generous living area that adjoining the kitchen with gas oven/stove and an included meals area. Both bedrooms feature built in wardrobes with sliding mirrored doors while the bathroom, separate toilet and laundry have all also been updated. Extras include ducted heating and roller shutters on north facing windows and outside you find a single garage with room in front for another car plus a paved courtyard to keep maintenance to a minimum. Well positioned with buses out the front, the home is within minutes of Clarinda Shopping Centre as well as central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station.
Insights: 2/559 Clayton Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.
